alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 555 PM EDT/455 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Chattahoochee, or 11 miles northeast of Blountstown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Hosford, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Clio, Kennys Mill, Lowry, Alliance and Blountstown Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
